DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Display the list of port groups, it's member ports and valid speeds. The port-group is not supported in all the hardware plaforms.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to know port group members, valid speeds and default speed. show port-group
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: show sonic# show port-group ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Port-group Interface range Valid speeds Default Speed ----------------------------------------------------------------------- 1 Ethernet0 - Ethernet11 10G, 25G 25G 2 Ethernet12 - Ethernet23 10G, 25G 25G 3 Ethernet24 - Ethernet35 10G, 25G 25G 4 Ethernet36 - Ethernet47 10G, 25G 25G sonic#

PARAM.name: speed
PARAM.help: Speed for the ports in port-group

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: This command configure port speed for the member ports of a port-group. The port-group is not supported in all the hardware plaforms.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to change the speed of the ports for the platform which supports port-group. port-group id speed speed-in-Mbps
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure terminal sonic(config)# port-group 1 speed 10000

COMMAND.name: no port-group
COMMAND.help: Change the port group configurations to default

PARAM.name: speed
PARAM.help: Speed for the ports in port-group

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: This command configure port speed for the member ports of a port-group to default value. The port-group is not supported in all the hardware plaforms.
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to revert the speed of the member ports to default, for the platform which supports port-group. no port-group id speed
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# configure terminal sonic(config)# no port-group 1 speed
